function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity to water source in construction","Impact":"Increased risk of waterborne diseases and mosquito breeding","Mitigation":"Implement proper drainage and sanitation systems, use mosquito control measures","Technologies":"Drainage systems, sanitation infrastructure, mosquito control technologies","People":"Construction workers, residents, visitors","Owner":"Architects, builders, city planners"},{"Description":"Designing with natural sceneries in suburban villas","Impact":"Potential for exposure to outdoor pollutants and allergens","Mitigation":"Use of air filtration systems, regular maintenance of greenery, proper ventilation","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, greenery maintenance equipment, ventilation systems","People":"Residents, visitors","Owner":"Landscape architects, villa owners"},{"Description":"Use of front porches to link houses and nature","Impact":"Increased exposure to outdoor pollutants, allergens and infectious agents","Mitigation":"Proper ventilation, air filtration systems, regular cleaning and maintenance of front porch areas","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filtration systems, cleaning equipment","People":"Residents, visitors","Owner":"Architects, homeowners"}]}
